dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Alright, Host_B, let's, um, kick things off with some pretty wild news from Tesla. Their shares, like, absolutely plummeted today.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Alright, Host B, let's, um, kick things off with some pretty wild news from Tesla. Their shares, like, absolutely plummeted today.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The shares spiked following the results announcement, rising 11% to $644.99 in after-hours Nasdaq trading.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, I saw that! Down 11% in after-hours trading, I mean, ouch. After such a massive run-up since October, too. What's the scoop?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, I saw that! Down eleven percent in after-hours trading, I mean, ouch. After such a massive run-up since October, too. What's the scoop?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The shares spiked following the results announcement, rising 11% to $644.99 in after-hours Nasdaq trading.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, they actually reported a net income of $105 million for the quarter, and revenue was decent at $7.38 billion. But, uh, their adjusted EPS, at $2.14, apparently fell short of expectations.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, they actually reported a net income of one hundred five million dollars for the quarter, and revenue was decent at seven point three eight billion dollars. But, uh, their adjusted E P S, at two point one four, apparently fell short of expectations.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Adjusted EPS was $2.14. That topped expectations of $1.72 a share and revenue of $7.02 billion, according to a Reuters survey of equity analysts.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Hmm, so the market didn't like what it saw, even with some green on the balance sheet. I guess annual profit is still, like, pretty elusive for them, huh?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hmm, so the market didn't like what it saw, even with some green on the balance sheet. I guess annual profit is still, like, pretty elusive for them, huh?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: While annual profit remains elusive... A decade after its initial public offering its never posted an annual profit.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. And, you know, Elon Musk claimed last year was a "turning point" for Tesla.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. And, you know, Elon Musk claimed last year was a turning point for Tesla.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Last year was a turning point for Tesla, Musk said in a letter to investors.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] Right, but the article points out they had "weak organic demand" for the Model 3, and, uh, didn't even return to GAAP profitability in the second half of 2019.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, but the article points out they had weak organic demand for the Model three, and, uh, didn't even return to G A A P profitability in the second half of twenty nineteen.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We demonstrated strong organic demand for Model 3, returned to GAAP profitability in 2H19 and generated $1.1B of free cash flow for the year.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! It's like, some analysts are totally rethinking their narrative. Morgan Stanley, for instance, seeing Tesla now as more of, um, an "unprofitable and cash-burning tech company."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! It's like, some analysts are totally rethinking their narrative. Morgan Stanley, for instance, seeing Tesla now as more of, um, an unprofitable and cash-burning tech company.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This quarter may be seen as the moment a new genre of tech investors were waiting to perceive Tesla through a new narrative: as a profitable and cash generative tech company with a reasonably-sized market cap in the same discussion as the mega-tech platform names, Morgan Stanley equity analyst Adam Jonas said in a research note.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, that's a pretty stark shift from, like, the tech darling narrative. And I heard about some production woes too, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, that's a pretty stark shift from, like, the tech darling narrative. And I heard about some production woes too, right?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, for sure. Model Y production starting later than scheduled in Fremont, the Shanghai plant is, like, running below expectations...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, for sure. Model Y production starting later than scheduled in Fremont, the Shanghai plant is, like, running below expectations...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In a surprise announcement, it said production of Model Y crossovers started this month at the Fremont, California, plant, earlier than initially scheduled. Meanwhile, Teslas Shanghai plant that opened in record time in January is running as expected.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And then Germany! Building that plant near Berlin is running into issues with, um, forests and water usage.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And then Germany! Building that plant near Berlin is running into issues with, um, forests and water usage.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: That remains to be seen, owing to local German opposition to Teslas plans to cut down a portion of existing forest and concerns about how much water the plant will use.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It's a lot, isn't it? Even the Model Y itself, apparently, less prestigious than other brands but, like, way more expensive than luxury competition.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's a lot, isn't it? Even the Model Y itself, apparently, less prestigious than other brands but, like, way more expensive than luxury competition.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It has a more prestigious brand than the mainstream hybrid nameplates but comes at a significantly less cost than the rest of the luxury competition.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Which, um, probably isn't helping sales. I mean, even Musk's own wealth took a pretty big hit because of this stock decline.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which, um, probably isn't helping sales. I mean, even Musk's own wealth took a pretty big hit because of this stock decline.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The stock surge has also dramatically increased Musks wealth. Forbes estimates the South African-born entrepreneurs net worth at $32.3 billion.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, Forbes estimates his net worth dropped significantly. So, like, is there *any* good news? Or is it all doom and gloom?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, Forbes estimates his net worth dropped significantly. So, like, is there any good news? Or is it all doom and gloom?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The stock surge has also dramatically increased Musks wealth. Forbes estimates the South African-born entrepreneurs net worth at $32.3 billion.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, one analyst, Garrett Nelson from CFRA, still has a "Buy" rating. He's, um, optimistic about the China factory ramp-up and the growing EV competition.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, one analyst, Garrett Nelson from C F R A, still has a Buy rating. He's, um, optimistic about the China factory ramp-up and the growing E V competition.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: CFRA equity analyst Garrett Nelson, who has a Sell rating on Tesla, thinks there are still reasons for caution. We continue to see significant risks related to the China factory ramp-up, as well as rising EV competition from automakers still eligible for the full federal tax credit in the U.S., Nelson said in a research note.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so a tiny glimmer of hope amidst, you know, what feels like a pretty rough patch. It'll be interesting to see how they, uh, navigate these next few quarters.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so a tiny glimmer of hope amidst, you know, what feels like a pretty rough patch. It'll be interesting to see how they, uh, navigate these next few quarters.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. A lot to unpack there for Tesla.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. A lot to unpack there for Tesla.
